name: Project Wulves [Sinbad Edition]
description:
Project Wulves [Sinbad Edition] is a top-down two-stick action game where you control an elite mercenary fighting to save the inhabitants of a remote border town from a dire threat. Chunky and deliberate ranged and melee combat mixes with run-based gameplay and semi-permanent unlocks to bring this fantasy adventure to life. 

Storyline

As a newly promoted member of the Wulves, a widely-respected mercenary company with ties to the Royal Family, you’ve been given a small unit of fresh recruits to take on a training mission. You’re a tough and capable fighter, your superiors have marked out your skills, and now you’re in charge of all the hiking, orienteering, and specialist combat drills out in the mountains near the border - your mission is to turn the fresh faces into a fighting force worthy of the Wulves name… your base of operations is a small provincial capital, and you’re resting up between fortnight-long training forays into the surrounding wilderness. It’s quiet here, the ale is fine and the food fresh. Even the beds get new straw every third moon. All in all a nice break from the boredom and bloodshed of mercenary life…

 ...but nothing’s ever that simple. An unknown aggressor attacks the town, and you’re stuck with no option but to take charge of the defences. Not the test of your skill of command you’d hoped for, nor one you’re sure can even be passed!

This project was created by an amazing talented team of third year students at Abertay University by the name of Sinbad Studios!

The game was built as a response to a game brief and regular development feedback written by us here at Spilt Milk Studios.

Supported platforms:
Project Wulves is playable on PC - it only supports controller. 

Specifications required:
RAM: 8GB
CPU: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor of 2.5 GHz or faster
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce 470GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD Series card or higher
DirectX Version: DirectX11 or DirectX12 compatible graphics card
Storage: 1GB minimum
